p: Blood-sucking insects were sampled every four months from November 2010 to August 2011 along with the longitudinal serological survey using double-net goat baited traps placed from 4:00 pm to 10:00 am. The sampling was carried out for three consecutive days in the study zones numbered 1, 3, 5 and 6 ( Figure 1). No sampling was performed in zones 2 and 4 for logistic reasons.
